name: Cheese Enchiladas
label: Mexican
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Spread 1/2 cup of enchilada sauce in a baking dish.
Warm tortillas if needed. Fill with cheese blend, black beans, and spinach.
Roll tortillas closed and place in the baking dish seam-side down.
Pour remaining sauce over enchiladas. Top with remaining cheese.
Bake uncovered for 20 minutes until cheese is melted.
Remove from oven, top with jalapeño, cilantro, avocado, and lime.
